member.name: T:Responsible.Core.IResponse
member.summary: Interface for a response object

summary.para: Defines the success of an operation.
Resolves to the success of an operation.
Status is handy for Web response Handling.
Annotate messages obtained by the operation.
Resolves to if an exception is captured.
Gets all messages as a Single Message, seperated by Environment.NewLine.
Contains the output of the operation.
It will resolve to Default value for Non-Nullable Types.

member.name: T:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory
member.summary: ResponseFactory is used for creating variouse types of responses

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Ok
member.summary: Creates OK Response

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Ok(System.String)
member.summary: Creates OK Response with a message

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Ok(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates OK Response with a messages

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Error(System.String,Responsible.Core.ErrorResponseStatus)
member.summary: Creates an Error Response with a message and Error Status

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Error(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},Responsible.Core.ErrorResponseStatus)
member.summary: Creates an Error Response with messages and Error Status

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.NotImplemented(System.String)
member.summary: Creates NotImplemented Response with a message

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.NotImplemented(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates NotImplemented Response with messages

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Exception
member.summary: Creates Exception Response with default message of "A system error occured."

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Exception(System.String)
member.summary: Creates Exception Response with a message

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Exception(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates Exception Response with a messages

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Exception(System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates Exception Response with default message of "A system error occured." Exception is obtained in the response."

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Exception(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Creates Exception Response with a message." Exception is obtained in the response."

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory.Exception(System.Exception,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates Exception Response with messages." Exception is obtained in the response."

member.name: T:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory`1
member.summary: ResponseFactory<T> is used for creating variouse types of responses where <T> is an output

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory`1.Ok(`0)
member.summary: Creates OK Response with operation output value

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory`1.Ok(`0,System.String)

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory`1.Ok(`0,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates OK Response with operation output value and messages.

member.summary: Creates an Error Response with messages and Error Status.

member.summary: Creates NotImplemented Response with a default message of "The method or operation is not implemented".

member.name: M:Responsible.Core.ResponseFactory`1.NotImplemented(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates NotImplemented Response with messages.
